row.process: INSERT INTO uc4.ov ( ov_oh_idnr, ov_vname, ov_value ) (SELECT oh_idnr, '&DUMMY_UC_TEST#', 'dummy7' FROM uc4.oh WHERE (oh_otype IN ('JOBP') OR oh_otype IN ('JSCH')) AND oh_client = '300' AND oh_deleteflag = 0 and oh_idnr not in (select ov_oh_idnr from uc4.ov)); update oh set oh_ov_flag = 1 where oh_idnr in (select ov_oh_idnr from ov) and OH_OV_Flag is null and OH_DeleteFlag = 0; commit
